/*==================================================
src/components/Home.js

The Home component is used to demonstrate the use of Link.
==================================================*/import React,{Component}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class Home extends Component{render(){const{accountBalance}=this.props;// Styling for the main container with a gradient background
const containerStyle={display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',height:'100vh',background:'linear-gradient(135deg, #e0e5ec, #f4f6f8)',fontFamily:"'Playfair Display', serif",padding:'20px'};// Dashboard box styling with a light shadow and padding
const dashboardStyle={maxWidth:'500px',width:'100%',backgroundColor:'#ffffff',borderRadius:'12px',boxShadow:'0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)',padding:'30px',textAlign:'center'};const headingStyle={fontSize:'2.5em',color:'#333333',marginBottom:'20px'};// Styling links as buttons for a modern dashboard look
const navLinksStyle={display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:'15px'};const linkStyle={color:'#ffffff',backgroundColor:'#0073e6',textDecoration:'none',fontWeight:'600',fontSize:'1.1em',padding:'10px 0',borderRadius:'8px',textAlign:'center',transition:'background-color 0.3s ease'};// Styling for the balance display
const balanceContainerStyle={marginBottom:'30px',padding:'20px',backgroundColor:'#eceff1',borderRadius:'10px',boxShadow:'0px 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)',textAlign:'center'};const balanceTextStyle={fontSize:'1.4em',color:'#333',fontWeight:'bold',marginBottom:'10px'};const amountStyle={fontSize:'2.5em',// Increased font size for emphasis
color:'#4CAF50',// Green color for the balance amount
fontWeight:'bold'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:containerStyle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:dashboardStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:headingStyle,children:"Welcome to Your Bank Account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:balanceContainerStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:balanceTextStyle,children:"Current Account Balance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:amountStyle,children:["$",accountBalance.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:navLinksStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/userProfile",style:linkStyle,children:"View Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",style:linkStyle,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/credits",style:linkStyle,children:"Credits"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/debits",style:linkStyle,children:"Debits"})]})]})});}}export default Home;
